title: Personal agent adapts to individual child's developmental pace
description: Personal agent adapts to individual child's developmental pace
content:
Scenario: Personal agent adapts to individual child's developmental pace
    Given Tommy is 5 years old
    And his developmental pace may differ from age-based averages
    When the personal_agent interacts with Tommy over time
    Then it should observe Tommy's actual capabilities
    And it should adapt guidance to his individual pace
    And it should not enforce rigid age-based expectations
    And it should support Tommy's unique development
    And learning should be paced to Tommy's readiness
